TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlHelper extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides support for rendering HTML form controls and performing form validation in a web page.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary AnonymousObjectToHtmlAttributes (object htmlAttributes);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary AnonymousObjectToHtmlAttributes(object htmlAttributes) cil managed
Public Shared Function AnonymousObjectToHtmlAttributes (htmlAttributes As Object) As RouteValueDictionary
static member AnonymousObjectToHtmlAttributes : obj -> System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary

Docs.param: Anonymous object describing HTML attributes.
Docs.summary: Creates a dictionary of HTML attributes from the input object, translating underscores to dashes.
Docs.returns: A dictionary that represents HTML attributes.

.method public hidebysig instance string AttributeEncode(object value) cil managed
Public Function AttributeEncode (value As Object) As String
member this.AttributeEncode : obj -> string

Docs.param: The object to encode.
Docs.summary: Returns an HTML-encoded string that represents the specified object by using a minimal encoding that is suitable only for HTML attributes that are enclosed in quotation marks.
Docs.returns: An HTML-encoded string that represents the object.

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.IHtmlString DropDownList(string name, string defaultOption, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Web.WebPages.Html.SelectListItem> selectList, object selectedValue, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, object> htmlAttributes) cil managed

Public Function DropDownList (name As String, defaultOption As String, selectList As IEnumerable(Of SelectListItem), selectedValue As Object, htmlAttributes As IDictionary(Of String, Object)) As IHtmlString
member this.DropDownList : string * string * seq<System.Web.WebPages.Html.SelectListItem> * obj * System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, obj> -> System.Web.IHtmlString

Docs.param: The value to assign to the name attribute of the HTML select element.
The text to display for the default option in the list.
A list of instances that are used to populate the list.

The value that specifies the item in the list that is selected by default. The selected item is the first item in the list whose value matches the parameter (or whose text matches, if there is no value.)
The names and values of custom attributes for the element.
Docs.summary: Returns an HTML drop-down list control that has the specified name, custom attributes defined by an attribute dictionary, and default selection, and that contains the specified list items and default item.
Docs.returns: The HTML markup that represents the drop-down list control.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.IHtmlString DropDownList (string name, string defaultOption, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Web.WebPages.Html.SelectListItem> selectList, object selectedValue, object htmlAttributes);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.IHtmlString DropDownList(string name, string defaultOption, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Web.WebPages.Html.SelectListItem> selectList, object selectedValue, object htmlAttributes) cil managed
Public Function DropDownList (name As String, defaultOption As String, selectList As IEnumerable(Of SelectListItem), selectedValue As Object, htmlAttributes As Object) As IHtmlString
member this.DropDownList : string * string * seq<System.Web.WebPages.Html.SelectListItem> * obj * obj -> System.Web.IHtmlString

Docs.param: The value to assign to the name attribute of the HTML select element.
The text to display for the default option in the list.
A list of instances that are used to populate the list.

The value that specifies the item in the list that is selected by default. The item that is selected is the first item in the list that has a matching value, or that matches the items displayed text if the item has no value.
An object that contains custom attributes for the element. The attribute names and values are retrieved through reflection by examining the properties of the object.
Docs.summary: Returns an HTML drop-down list control that has the specified name, custom attributes defined by an attribute object, and default selection, and that contains the specified list items and default item.
Docs.returns: The HTML markup that represents the drop-down list control.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the character that is used to replace the dot (.) in the id attribute of rendered form controls.
Docs.value: The character that is used to replace the dot in the id attribute of rendered form controls. The default is an underscore (_).

Docs.param: The value to assign to the name attribute of the HTML select element.
A list of instances that are used to populate the list.
An object that specifies the items in the list that are selected by default. The selections are retrieved through reflection by examining the properties of the object.

true to indicate that the multiple selections are enabled; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,object> ObjectToDictionary (object value);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, object> ObjectToDictionary(object value) cil managed
Public Shared Function ObjectToDictionary (value As Object) As IDictionary(Of String, Object)
static member ObjectToDictionary : obj -> System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, obj>

Docs.param: The object to be converted.
Docs.summary: Creates a dictionary from an object, by adding each public instance property as a key with its associated value to the dictionary. It will expose public properties from derived types as well. This is typically used with objects of an anonymous type.
Docs.returns: The created dictionary of property names and property values.

Docs.summary: Returns an HTML span element that contains the first validation error message for the specified form field.
Docs.returns: If the value in the specified field is valid, null; otherwise, the HTML markup that represents the validation error message that is associated with the specified field.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the CSS class that defines the appearance of validation error messages when validation fails.
Docs.value: The name of the CSS class. The default is field-validation-error.

Docs.summary: Returns an HTML div element that contains an unordered list of all validation error messages from the model-state dictionary.
Docs.returns: The HTML markup that represents the validation error messages.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.IHtmlString ValidationSummary (bool excludeFieldErrors);

Docs.param: true to exclude field-level validation error messages from the list; false to include both model-level and field-level validation error messages.
Docs.summary: Returns an HTML div element that contains an unordered list of validation error message from the model-state dictionary, optionally excluding field-level errors.
Docs.returns: The HTML markup that represents the validation error messages.
